entries.npc_4_3: Ship parts are expensive.  They're probably trying to build their own ship, or they're going to sell it on the black market.
entries.npc_4_2: Actually I don't remember.  That's another reason I need that ledger back.  It might have been mayor...or chief of police...hm...
entries.npc_4_1: Well, it's not much to look at, but I guess because it was in the safe they assumed it was valuable.  It is, but only to me really, they won't get much for it.
entries.npc_reward_4: Here's a recording rod that I paid way too much for.  It's valuable but fragile.  Be careful with it.
entries.npc_3_4: Just like my servants.  No help at all.
entries.npc_2_4: I thought you looked like the man I wanted.  I'll reward you nicely for it.
entries.npc_1_4: My servants won't get me the dishes I want.  There's  a guy who has a bowl that's the exact one I want.  I don't care how you do it, just get me that bowl.
entries.player_1_4: Sounds crazy but I'll do it.
entries.player_3_1: Somebody stole an heirloom glass?  Why?
entries.player_3_2: What office are you running for?
entries.npc_reward_3: Here you go.  This is a picture I took taking off from an undiscovered planet.  That picture is one of a kind.
entries.player_2_3: I thought pilot's did their own work.  I'll be going.
entries.npc_3_3: I thought you were a tough one.  I guess not.
entries.npc_2_3: Ok.  Just let me know when you've got it.
entries.npc_1_3: A gang of ruffians stole part of the hyperdrive out of my ship.  Get it back for me and I'll give you something nice.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here's your official proclamation.  It won't be valid unless I get elected, but hang onto it just in case.
entries.player_2_2: No way.   I couldn't care less about politics.
entries.player_1_2: Sure, I'll get your ledger back.  I need friends in high places.
entries.npc_3_2: That's too bad.  I could have done you a lot of favors.
entries.npc_2_2: Excellent.  Just let me know when you return, I'll have the paperwork drawn up.
entries.npc_1_2: I was collecting signatures to get my name on the local ballot when one of my opponents sent a theif to steal my ledger.  If you can get that ledger back for me I'll write a proclamation declaring you a good citizen.
entries.npc_reward_1: Careful with this thing.  It's well put together, but if you crush it it won't be worth as much.
entries.player_2_1: Sounds ridiculous.  Why don't you just go buy a new glass?
entries.player_1_1: Yeah, I can get it.  I'll need some form of payment though.
entries.npc_3_1: I thought you were a mercenary?  Perhaps you're just a librarian or some such...
entries.npc_2_1: You're a life saver.  I'll give you this hand woven basket for the glass when you return.  My servants made it.
entries.npc_1_1: My family has had this heirloom glass for many years, and now it's been stolen.  I can tell you where the thief is, but I need you to bring back my glass unharmed.  Can you do it?
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.player_3_4: Why don't you just buy your own dishes?
entries.player_3_3: Why would they steal parts of your ship?
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
entries.npc_4_4: A nobleman gets other people to do these things for him.  People like you.
